mapper.insert: insert into patent_team ( patent_id, user_id, contribution ) values ( #{patent_id}, #{user_id}, #{contribution} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name name,u.department_id department_id, u.role_id role_id, t.contribution contribution FROM user u, patent p, patent_team t WHERE p.patent_id = #{patent_id} and p.patent_id = t.patent_id and t.user_id = u.user_id
